评论详情: I'm 5'4", 145 lbs, and the medium fits great. The pants are a teensy bit long, but I just pull the waist up a smidge. The jacket fits appropriately, not tight, even when zipped. The material is really soft and thicker than I expected. Very cute, I'm happy with my purchase. Perfect for weekends running errands or a comfortable outfit for traveling. Affordable alternative to the Sp@nx A!r Essenti@ls track suit.

I’m 5’2” so the pants were a tad long. I had to wear them very high wasted. That’s okay though because this was such a great, comfortable set! I will most likely be ordering in other colors. For reference I’m 130 pounds and got a size small. True to size. The red color is so pretty. The material is so silky and soft. Definitely a good dupe for the spanx sets.

评论概述: So Nice but not on Me
评论详情: This is a knock off of the Spanx Version that is sold separately and totals $300 for the set.  It was packaged nicely. Nice construction but there were a couple of loose threads.  The material was soft and felt nice. I loved the way the blocks of white lined up from the jacket to the pants.  I ordered a XXL. I am not used to short jackets but this fit perfectly and was very comfortable. It came right to my waist. The pants were more of a 3X-4X. The waist was a little loose but doable, but the wide legs were too too wide and they were about 4 inches too long, I’m 5’7”.  Sadly I had to return the set, I was heart broken. I hope it works for you it was a great deal and a beautiful design.

"The fabric is very soft and color as advertised.  I love this outfit, perfect fit and length. I am 5'8" size women regular 18, out of the XL by 2 inches (lol).  Seriously, I lost weight and this outfit is a great wardrobe builder for a retiree, or active any age.  The pockets are convenient, too.keys and or phone.. Casual day at the office would also work for movies or walking the dog.

UPDATE - I had a seamstress replace the elastic waistband - perfect fit.  Looks great after washing and low setting dryer.  Will buy more.  These are a great weight for our mild winters in Phoenix.I love this track suit.  The material is very soft, came packaged well, and no wrinkles.  My only semi complaint is this waist is a bit tight, although I purchased a Medium, waist feels like a small, and sometimes the elastic band will flip. Nothing so uncomfortable that I would return it,  and will most likely purchased another set and lose a few pounds. :).  For reference, 5’6”. 165.  40D
I was really surprised. Beautiful fit and love the material . Very soft and comfortable. Size wise perfect. It looks lovely!

This is so much nicer than expected!  I think it looks cute on and it's comfortable!  Lightweight if you are cold weather, but just right for warm California desert winters.  I am 5'4 and 128 and am wearing a small, which fits well.  The jacket is slightly loose at the waist and the pants are tighter at the waist.  However, I'm in my mid-60's and my waistline is not the same as a younger woman's : )I love this in black and am going to buy one for my friend!

评论概述: Very deep heat press marks, successfully washed out
评论详情: I chose the black-and-white tracksuit in a size small so I do believe this runs true to size. This is very thin and lightweight and so soft. The fabric feels wonderful on and the zipper works perfectly. It had just a touch of a smell to it, but my concern was the heavy deep heat press marks that were on it. Thankfully, I was able to wash them out and the outfit looks fine now, but that would cause a problem if I were to gift this. It’s a beautiful outfit and so comfortable on just keep an eye out for that specific issue. If it wasn’t for that, I would give this a perfect review because it feels wonderful on, washes well, can be versatile as you can definitely layer underneath it and the dupe look it has is spot on. I’m 5’7 and the length was perfect on me.

This is very cute. It’s a great dupe for the Spanx set - less than 1/4 of the price of that set. The material is not nearly as thick or plush, but for the cost difference, I will take it. It runs a little big. I’m 5’ and a size 8. I got the medium, and it’s a little long, pulled all the way up, it comes wayyy up - like up over my ribs, and is a little longer than I’d prefer. Again, for the price, I’ll deal with it. I do with the jacket had pockets. The color is perfect. It isn’t too warm, I think it will be good year round. I plan to wear it for a couple of trips I have coming up, it will be good for the airports and daytime adventures. Buyer beware though. It really smells when you first open the package. I washed it two times right away to take care of that issue, but still. It was not ideal.

I really loved the color of this suit. I got the gray blue. However, the pants are thin and they do show cellulite. Maybe if I tried a darker color it wouldn't show. I'm 5'2" and 120 lbs. The pant length was a little long, but it would probably be okay when I wear sneakers. I ended up returning because I knew I'd be self conscious about the cellulite. The material is thin, but very comfortable and stretchy.

I haven’t laundered this yet but basically it was love at first sight when I took it out of the package. The fabric is just lovely - smooth and cool feeling against the skin, and substantial. Yet I can see myself wearing this for all seasons. The fit is just about perfect. I’m five foot five inches and weigh 135 pounds. Bust is 36C and I got the small. If the pants were just a tad longer I would be over the moon. I will be ordering this on other colors.

The item was as exactly as described and fits beautifully. I've received multiple compliments. I'm 5 1.5, 135-145 lbs, and I ordered the Medium. I may purchase it in an additional color! I haven't done multiple washings yet, so I can't yet opine on durability. But, for the price and the fabric quality (good), it doesn't have to last forever to still be a good buy.

Just what I have been looking for...hate to say how many others I have tried.  The fabric is very nice...construction is very good..all in all a quality product and best of all, it fit perfectly!  I purchased a medium .. .I am 5'4" and weigh 135

I love this suit. I bought another one in black. It’s super comfortable to wear. I bought to travel in but have been wearing it everywhere. The material is soft, not too thick or too thin. Just perfect.  The pants run a tiny bit long but I love them long so I can wear them with my platform tennis shoes. Love it.
Great material. Pants run real long if you are 5'5". I am reducing by one star due to no pockets in the jacket.

Really impressed with this set (I got the blue, Small size, I am 5'4" 135lbs). Good material, did not come creased up, which some reviewers noted. Color is very nice and the fit is spot on. I will now order in another color. Oh and it came very quickly, 2 days.

I ordered large even though chart said extra large would be my best fit… and it may have been if I was wanting it just for lounge wear. I’m thick and only 5’ tall the fit is ample for my body just about 2” too long for me But I’ll hem no problem because it’s so cozy A great travel pair for airplane which was my point of ordering. I can pair with a travel blazer and slip ons and it looks great! Take off the jacket and you’re lounging once more!

I bought this to wear on a flight for vacation and it was perfect! Comfortable, soft and easy to get around in.  I received so many compliments on it as well.  I wish I could afford one in every color, but for now I will enjoy wearing this one.

评论概述: This is soooo nice was worried it would be short since im 5'9"

I have eyed the Spanx sweatsuit for awhile and just could not get myself to pay the money and I'm glad I didn't! With the exception of the wide bottom leg, this sweatsuit looks the same. The material is amazingly soft and the waistband has give. I didn't want to take it off after I tried it on. I do not like the ankle look on any of my pants, so I ordered a small & med to compare lengths. I'm 5'7" and 152lbs....while the length on the med was better ( it grazed the floor) it was too big overall. With that said, I will have to wear the small size pants at a low waist ( under bellybutton ) to get the same length affect as the med. But, overall you should love the sweatsuit.

I bought this as a Christmas gift on October 24th. The gift was just received on Christmas Day and does not fit. The return date has passed. Is there anything you can do to help me with this situation? Thank you.

The pants drape so nice and are just the right length. The fabric is so soft! I got many compliments. It’s awesome to look pulled together so easily. A real confidence booster. A good dupe of that one expensive brand.

Looks good on Fabric is nice i have not washed it yet but so far I like it

This is a great track suit that looks soooo much like the popular spanx one that’s out right now, but for a fraction of the price! They look the same but these do not have any compression. But the pants have pockets and this is great deal!
I wear this all the time. It has a high end quality feel. It washes nice. It looks classy, it’s my new favorite lounge wear!

I ordered a small. I’m 5 foot two., 128 pounds and it fits like a dream. The material feels thin so if you’re going to wear it to the gym, it would work well. You wouldn’t overheat. The jacket hangs beautifully and for a small, is not tight.
The quality is awesome. It’s machine washable. I hung them to dry. No pockets in the pants. There is pockets in the jacket.

评论概述: Great fit, great price, great quality
评论详情: It is much better quality than expected and fit much better than expected. I ordered a Medium. I'm 5'1 and built muscular and curvy. I would say it almost runs a little on the big side. My only note (not a complaint because it still fits great) is that the top came as a Medium but the bottoms say Small. Not sure if that's a misprint or just shipped that way by accident. I ordered another one. It gives me just enough warmth for chilly days. The material is high quality and stretchy. The pockets lay flat (sometimes with wider hips then can pop out).
I ordered a large  fit my height but it was too baggy so I'll return it for a Medium.The outfit is jazzy. Material comfy ,soft very dressy. It's a keeper!

I love the look of the set with the bold stripes that line up (I got black), but the material is so thin and lightweight for the pants. Suitable for cool summer nights. I can’t see myself wearing it for fall or winter because it’s just not warm enough. Material is decently soft/silky on the inside, super soft/silky on the outside.  5’2”, 117#, 29-31 waist, 34D - size small fit best, but was too tight on my waist. Pant length was just to the floor. Medium fit my waist better, but was too loose/big overall, 1.5” too long, but passable since oversized is in style. I ordered a set by Casey Limit with double stripes that was silkier/softer and similarly thin/lightweight, but with wider legs. I might go with that one since it’s softer.  Bottom line: I wish it was thicker/warmer and then I would love it.

So cute when I 1st put it on. I love the fabric weight. It helps the pants hang beautifully. Only bummer is the elastic waistband is not sewn to keep it in place.  It wants to twist when you are  pulling them up or down. I think I can fix it easily but wish I didn’t have to but I washed them prior to wearing so 😉 hence 4 stars.  All said and done I love the set.

... the jacket has no pockets! Who does that? Whoever you are, don't do that. We girls LOVE pockets. Other than that, this item is a winner. Let's see how it looks after the first wash. I shall return with an update. Stay tuned ... dun dun duuuunnn...
Perfect size perfect fit looked great. Washed good.

The fabric is soft, not thick, and didn't come all wrinkled as many do.  At 5'6", 122, size 4, fits perfect, like a 4.  May look into other colors as this seems very stylish to wear casually or for travel.  The length is just like the model, falls just above the shoes.  Highly recommend!

I like most things. Lighter weight than I expected but nice. Jacket is big in the waist. Pants are tighter in the waists. Perfect fit. Not too long but length could be more generous. Love the look and comfort. A real buy.

When I first read the reviews about how butter soft this set was, the first thing that came to my mind was, “great, it’ll show all my imperfections.”  Well, even though you can’t see it in the photo, my imperfections, aka-cottage cheese, cellulite, bumps, and stuff, remain disguised under this lovely fabric! Sooo... cute. I (sadly??) own the MUCH MORE EXPENSIVE Spanx jumpsuit and jacket that presumably this outfit dupes. I really love this outfit, esp at this price. I am 5'7" and about 150lbs. My legs must be longer than avg for my height. The pants are just a touch shorter than I prefer when I have on athletic shoes. Also, the jacket is just a touch larger than PERFECT. BUT, for this price.... this outfit is wonderful. It is a perfect weight for air conditioned spaces and Fall. The material is great. My only small "meh" is the lining. It feels slick in that plasticy non-breathable, polyester way (boo..). I would expect that it might make you feel hot, if you overheat easily. I do not and plan to wear the outfit into the fall with tights to keep me warm. I absolutely love how the white stripes on the black outfit line up when the jacket is zipped up. I highly recommend. You'll love it too.
